Title: An Act Converting the Moscoso Rios Barangay High School in the Municipality of Hamtic, Province of Antique, into a National High School to be Known as the Governor Villavert Jimenez National School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 575
An Act Converting the Moscoso Rios Barangay High School in the Municipality of Hamtic, Province of Antique, into a National High School to be Known as the Governor Villavert Jimenez National School
Section 1. The Moscoso Rios Barangay High School in the Municipality of Hamtic, Province of Antique, is converted into a national high school to be known as the Governor Villavert Jimenez National School.
Section 2. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its shares of national aid to local schools. The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 24, 1983
